content:
I'd be happy to help! However, I need a bit more information from you. Could you please provide me with the following details:

1. What is the city or zip code of your office location in the downtown area?
2. Are you looking for a specific type of coffee shop (e.g. independent, chain, specialty coffee roaster)?

Once I have this information, I can try to provide you with a list of coffee shops near your office that sell Italian Roast coffee beans.

Note: As a digital AI assistant, I don't have real-time access to specific business information. However, I can try to suggest some options based on online directories and reviews.
